data.lyric:
[ti:Mele Kalikimaka (merry Christmas)]
[ar:Bing Crosby/The Andrews Sisters]
[al:White Christmas - Let It Snow!]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Mele Kalikimaka (Merry Christmas) - Bing Crosby (平克·劳斯)/The Andrews Sisters
[00:10.36]Mele Kalikimaka is the thing to say on a bright Hawaiian Christmas Day
[00:17.96]
[00:19.93]That's the island greeting that we send to you from the land
[00:24.86]
[00:26.06]Where palm trees sway
[00:27.76]
[00:29.58]Here we know that Christmas will be green and bright
[00:32.96]
[00:33.99]The sun to shine by day and all the star's at night
[00:37.92]
[00:38.79]Mele Kalikimaka is Hawaii's way to say merry Christmas to you
[00:46.22]
[00:48.23]Mele Kalikimaka is the thing to say on a bright Hawaiian Christmas day
[00:55.46]
[00:57.59]That's the island greeting that we send to you from the land
[01:02.83]Where palm trees sway
[01:04.82]
[01:07.01]Here we know that Christmas will be green and bright
[01:10.50]
[01:11.44]The sun to shine by day and all the star's at night
[01:15.04]
[01:16.37]Mele Kalikimaka is Hawaii's way to say merry Christmas to you
[01:23.65]
[01:44.70]Here we know that Christmas will be green and bright
[01:48.41]
[01:49.18]The sun to shine by day and all the star's at night
[01:52.89]
[01:54.03]Mele Kalikimaka is Hawaii's way to say merry Christmas to you
[02:01.16]
[02:08.22]Mele Kalikimaka is the thing to say on a bright Hawaiian Christmas Day
[02:15.32]
[02:17.66]That's the island greeting that we send to you from the land
[02:22.59]Where palm trees sway
[02:24.60]
[02:26.79]Here we know that Christmas will be green and bright
[02:30.28]
[02:31.14]The sun to shine by day and all the star's at night
[02:34.66]
[02:35.79]Mele Kalikimaka is Hawaii's way to say merry Christmas
[02:41.72]
[02:42.62]A very merry Christmas a very very merry merry Christmas to you
data.trans:
[ti:]
[ar:Bing Crosby/The Andrews Sisters]
[al:White Christmas - Let It Snow!]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:10.36]在日光充足的夏威夷 说 圣诞快乐 就是说 圣诞快乐
[00:17.95]
[00:19.93]来自棕榈树摇曳的小岛上 
[00:24.86]
[00:26.06]这就是我们对你的祝福
[00:27.76]
[00:29.58]在这里 我们知道圣诞节可以是带着葱茏绿意又晴朗明媚的
[00:32.96]
[00:33.99]白天阳光普照 晚上群星闪烁
[00:37.92]
[00:38.79]说 圣诞快乐 就是夏威夷祝你 圣诞快乐 的方式
